name: part_012
file: tmp_【新衣装3Dお披露目】AZKi 6th Anniversary Live ＂百花繚乱＂【#AZKi新衣装3Dライブ】 [bHXB9qI2olE]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: A music video sequence showcasing AZKi's new digital single 'Kagerou no Shirabe' with autumn-themed visuals.
AZKi announces the digital release and MV premiere of her new single 'Kagerou no Shirabe'.
An ending screen for the 'AZKi 6th Anniversary Live - Hyakkaryouran' with background music.

subtitles.original: 過ぎゆく季節、音もなく
subtitles.english: The passing seasons, without a sound

subtitles.original: 心の奥に響く声
subtitles.english: A voice echoing deep within my heart

subtitles.original: カゲロウの調べに乗せて
subtitles.english: Carried on the melody of the heat haze

subtitles.original: 君との記憶　消えないように
subtitles.english: So that my memories with you will not fade

subtitles.original: 結び合う手が伝うぬくもり
subtitles.english: The warmth transmitted through our clasped hands

subtitles.original: この瞬間を永久に刻む
subtitles.english: I'll carve this moment into eternity

subtitles.original: ひらひらと舞う、夜風に乗せ
subtitles.english: Dancing flutteringly, carried on the night breeze

subtitles.original: 共に歩んだ日々を感じて
subtitles.english: Feeling the days we walked together

subtitles.original: 未来を描く　君と二人で
subtitles.english: Drawing the future, just the two of us

subtitles.original: 今宵もまた光の中へ
subtitles.english: Tonight again, into the light

subtitles.original: ということで、AZKiの新曲「カゲロウの調べ」
subtitles.english: And so, AZKi's new song, "Kagerou no Shirabe"...

subtitles.original: 11月16日土曜日、配信リリース決定！
subtitles.english: ...is set for digital release on Saturday, November 16th!

subtitles.original: この後、11月16日土曜日0時から各配信サービスにて配信開始。
subtitles.english:
Starting from midnight on Saturday, November 16th,
it will be available on various streaming services.

subtitles.original: さらに、11月16日土曜日21時からミュージックビデオ、YouTubeプレミア公開！
subtitles.english:
Furthermore, the music video will have its
YouTube premiere at 9:00 PM on Saturday, November 16th!

subtitles.original: 待機所はこの放送後、爆誕します！お楽しみに！
subtitles.english:
The waiting room will be created right after this broadcast!
Please look forward to it!

subtitles.original: さらに、12月にも新曲あるかも？
subtitles.english: And there might even be a new song in December?

subtitles.original: ぜひこちらも、お楽しみに！
subtitles.english: Please look forward to that as well!

subtitles.original: 以上、お知らせでした！
subtitles.english: That's all for the announcements!

subtitles.original: それでは、アンコールライブでお会いしましょう！
subtitles.english: Well then, I'll see you at the encore live!

subtitles.original: 今日は、ありがとうございました！バイバーイ！
subtitles.english: Thank you so much for today! Bye-bye!
